p: Dried fruit of S. chinensis (10.0 g) was placed in a round bottom flask and DES (300 mL) was added. Ultrasound-assisted extraction was conducted in an ultrasound/microwave extraction apparatus (XH-300A, Xianghu Sci. & Tech. Co. Ltd., Beijing, China) for 60 min at 550 W [ 29]. A sample was taken every 10 min to obtain the extraction kinetic curve. The same operation methods used in the section “Compared Extraction Method of Polysaccharides” were employed after the extraction was complete.
